            <string language="en">The Winter Palace</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Winter-Palast</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Palais d'Hiver</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Palácio Do Inverno</string>

          <description>
            <string language="hu">Az orosz cárok téli palotája a Néva felől</string>
            <string language="en">The Winter Palace, the Russian tzars' residence, seen from River Neva </string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Szentpétervár,  cár,  </string>

          <description>

tzars', gesehen vom Fluß Neva</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le palais d'hiver, la résidence des tzars 
russes, vue du fleuve Neva</string>

          <description>

russian, vista do rio Neva</string>
          </description>

russi, vista dal fiume Neva</string>

          <description>

που βλέπει από τον ποταμό Neva</string>

            <string language="x-mt-es">El palacio del invierno, la residencia de los
